stories.text:
I live in a small city (population around 10k), and using Facebook groups and Facebook marketplace is just super painful. People keep asking the same questions for recommendations, posts are getting lost, so giving away things or selling is not efficient.

How can I quickly put together something? Is there something like Shopify but for craigslist-like website (forum/classified)?

I don't want to code anything, I just want to pay monthly, and get things up and running quickly.
stories.title: Ask HN: What to use for simple craigslist-like website for my local community?
